sourcesContent: import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import Title from '../../Global/Title' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {getCities} from '../../../redux/actions/city.action' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Slider from "react-slick"; function CityCard({city:{id, thumbnail, name}}) { return ( <> <div className="flex mx-auto px-8 py-8" data-aos="fade-up"> <div key={key}> <Link to={`/city/${city.id}`} className="no-underline hover:no-underline text-black hover:text-gray-700 px-8 mx-auto"> <div className="w-full mx-auto cursor-pointer px-4"> <div className="w-60 h-60 flex items-center justify-center"> <img src={city.thumbnail} alt="city" className="w-56 h-56 rounded-full object-cover hover:shadow-2xl"/> </div> <p className="mx-16 mt-3 text-lg font-semibold font-serif"> {city.name} </p> </div> </Link> </div> </div> </> ) } export default Cities;
